ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of robes, I saw someone wearing black robes with red runes stitched along the hood, down the middle, and along the cuffs. I WANT! Not sure if it s a
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of robes, I saw someone wearing black robes with red runes stitched
along the hood, down the middle, and along the cuffs. I WANT! Not sure if
it's a GM's or something, but damn was impressive. Sort of pisses me off
that we don't have more variety in robes. You see a warrior dressed all in
chain and he draws this HUGE crowd at a newbie zone. I'll admit, looks
damned impressive. Elven warriors in chain have this neat green tree thing
emblazoned on it. I still look like a newbie in my Sr. Apprentice
Robes...blah....Okay, so I'm conceited. We're talking raw power class here,
we're SUPPOSED to be conceited.... : )

I AM however willing to go to EXTREME lengths to get a somewhat unique
'look'. Hell, I don't even care about AC or anything. Just want to look like
something other than an Intel Bunny person without his helmet.

Zalbar
14th Intel Bunny
Solusek Ro
